hello there

Julia Reis

In a dinner party conversation, I'm a nerd who works with many screens and colorful letters.

Using the Linkedin language, I am a Full-Stack developer based in Berlin, Germany.

My name is Julia. I am always up for a clean and efficient code, also committed to bring new ideas, accessibility and fun. I have studied Web Development with amazing professionals, and during this period I created and improved several Websites using JavaScript, CSS, Jquery and others technologies. Beyond coding, my interests include Biology, Data Science, watercolor painting, nintendo, and continuous learning. I also firmly believe ice cream is the best food for any occasion.
